channel.title: Server editing(delta)
channel.description: Ok i finally got my server up and running but I want to know how to add teleports like Monsters, Minigames, pking, ect. but most importantly how do you make a home area like where new players log in and where all the shops are and stuff?

item.title: Server editing(delta)
item.dc:creator: @911_u_died 911 u died
item.description:
@911_u_died wrote:

standing1lasttime i messeged u it and,
i am just supposed to backscape the 0’s and add my own coordinates right

Read full topic

item.title: Server editing(delta)
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“911 u died, post:3, topic:367062”]where is that client.java?
nd wth i edited my starter pack and now i cant log onto my server after i click accept when changing my characters looks it just freezes and the run.bat
DeltaScape Server.
Rgergegeg: character file not found.
[client-1-Rgergegeg]: Invalid Server: Deltascape
Disconnected Rgergegeg, Data transfer timeout.
ClientHandler: Client Rgergegeg disconnected (127.0.0.1)[/quote]

I think thats anti-leach. (not sure if your usin delta relealse or the other)

And also, the question is in client.java.
Just search the message and change/delete it.

[quote=“Standing1LastTime, post:2, topic:367062”]How to make teleporters… 1ST. Put this somewhere in the Client.Java File

    case 0000:   <--- Object ID
        if (objectX == 0000 && objectY == 0000) {    <--- If the object is in this location teleport...
            sendMessage("You Teleport");          <---- Text to send if teleported
            teleportToX = 0000;         <----X Location
            teleportToY = 0000;        <---Y Location
        }
        break;

===========================================
How to make players start out on locations:Open Player.Java
Search------------------------------
teleportToX =
----This Should Pop Up------
teleportToX = 0000
teleportToY = 0000

Add the location you want the player to appear when they are new[/quote]

There is no need to add a new code because it will all be in clickingmost or client class.

Read full topic

item.title: Server editing(delta)
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Don’t have much to explain all this so I’ll answer the basics:

Monsters can be found in Autospawn.Cfg.
NpcDrops can be found in Npcdrops.cfg.
Shops can be found in Shops.Cfg (Items + Amount) and to put were you want them can also be found in Autospawn.cfg

Good luck on server mate, sorry I couldn’t have the time to explain it all.

Read full topic

item.title: Server editing(delta)
item.dc:creator: @Standing1LastTime Standing1LastTime
item.description:
@Standing1LastTime wrote:

How to make teleporters… 1ST. Put this somewhere in the Client.Java File

    case 0000:   <--- Object ID
        if (objectX == 0000 && objectY == 0000) {    <--- If the object is in this location teleport...
            sendMessage("You Teleport");          <---- Text to send if teleported
            teleportToX = 0000;         <----X Location
            teleportToY = 0000;        <---Y Location
        }
        break;

===========================================
How to make players start out on locations:Open Player.Java
Search------------------------------
teleportToX =
----This Should Pop Up------
teleportToX = 0000
teleportToY = 0000

Add the location you want the player to appear when they are new

Read full topic
